solution_line_template: The first week she walked {miles_week1} mile, {days_per_week} days a week for a total of {miles_week1}*{days_per_week} = <<{miles_week1}*{days_per_week}={total_miles_week1}>>{total_miles_week1} miles

The second week she walked {miles_week2} miles, {days_per_week} days a week for a total of {miles_week2}*{days_per_week} = <<{miles_week2}*{days_per_week}={total_miles_week2}>>{total_miles_week2} miles

The third week she walked {miles_week3} miles, {days_per_week} days a week for a total of {miles_week3}*{days_per_week} = <<{miles_week3}*{days_per_week}={total_miles_week3}>>{total_miles_week3} miles

On the fourth week, she walked {miles_week4} miles a day, {days_per_week} days a week for a total of {miles_week4}*{days_per_week} = <<{miles_week4}*{days_per_week}={total_miles_week4}>>{total_miles_week4} miles

Over four weeks she has walked {total_miles_week1}+{total_miles_week2}+{total_miles_week3}+{total_miles_week4} = <<{total_miles_week1}+{total_miles_week2}+{total_miles_week3}+{total_miles_week4}={total_miles_four_weeks}>>{total_miles_four_weeks} miles
